unnormalised: Arre, taxes bharnn mhannllear Bollywood-antleo ghutti sodunk sodchea bhaxen – tumkam dista tumkam te koll’lle, ani Income Tax Dept notice dhaddta! 31/07 poilim submit korunk zai nam tor, penalty bharna padtega, bhai!
normalised: Arre, tax bharnne mhunllear Bollywood plot twists somzunk proyotn korchea sarkhem – tumkam lagta ki tumkam koll'lle, ani Income Tax D-e-p-t notice dhaddta! Ttisaave julychea adim submit korchem poddtta nam tor, penalty bharnna padtta, bhai!
text: Arre, taxes bharnn mhannllear Bollywood-antleo ghutti sodunk sodchea bhaxen – tumkam dista tumkam te koll’lle, ani Income Tax Dept notice dhaddta! 31/07 poilim submit korunk zai nam tor, penalty bharna padtega, bhai!
